original_title: Amador J. Nunes Saúda Todos os Amigos e Presentes
overview: Description: View made of Santa Tereza, seeing the Church of Nossa Senhora da Salette, Estação da Light and Corcovado. Woman and girl holding cameras. Bride and groom receiving greetings. Children playing. Beach and bathers. Cine-Theatro Sport Paquetá. Hovels. Man drawing water from the well. Woman holding baby.
title: Amador J. Nunes Saúda Todos os Amigos e Presentes
